## Vector2.(constructor)

Creates a new Vector2 from the given x and y coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    x?: number, 
    y?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the first coordinate |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the second coordinate |
